pullRequest.title: [1.16] Re-introduce "outdated" notification on Mods button in main menu
pullRequest.bodyText:
1.12 and earlier showed the emerald "outdated" icon on the Mods button in the main menu when any mod is outdated.
This was removed in 1.13.

commit.message: re-introduce "outdated" notification on Mods button in main menu

nodes.bodyText: What's the reason behind chaning the default from VersionChecker.Status.UP_TO_DATE to null
